value:
I can perform a rite that births
fearsome warriors. Say the word,
and I will offer you their strength.

To think that the descendants of the
crusaders have gathered in this
world... I should conceal my identity.

To enter battle...is imprudent at best.
Arrange it so that ambitious tools and
decorated warriors do it for you...

Summoner...if you have interest in
my power, we must speak. I would
ask something of you...

I must briefly take my leave of
you. Oh, it's nothing important...

I have an interest in you... Ever since
your name fell from the lips of
$Nf.

Fear and confusion will spread. As
the world falls to chaos, it sinks ever
further into darkness...

Death should not be feared, but
worshipped... Its power becomes
the power of the Loptr Church.
Tch!
Seeking my favor? Clever.

I am Veld. I serve the great priest
Manfroy. Speak ill and you shall
find yourself made of stone.

Are you enjoying these battles,
Summoner? No, you need not
reply... Simply listen.$k$pThis is neither Grannvale nor Thracia.
Without Manfroy's orders, I may act
as I see fit...or not act at all.$k$pYou seem to understand that endless
skirmishes will not bring the conflict
to an end. There is a larger picture...$k$pTo move the world you must listen in
the shadows. Discipline your mind...
Choose whether wars begin or end.$k$pSupporting the simple, honest prince
of this land and becoming one of his
closest confidants? A solid plan...$k$pWhat's that look? I am stating things
plainly! Now, about that matter I had
wanted to discuss...
はあっ
Is that all?
ぬぬっ
Such impudence...
How shall I deal with you?
Be still.
I'll drag you down!
Feel my power!
This changes nothing...
cackle
I am Veld. I serve the great priest Manfroy.
Vex me further and you'll find yourself made of stone.
Pitting Thracia against itself worked quite well, wouldn't you agree?
That brat from Leonster and Travant are mere puppets dancing at my command.
If it's a deadlord you want, a corpse is all I'll need.
My death is meaningless. Loptr will not fall, struggle as you may...
A world of peace... *chuckle* Best not to speak such foolish ideas.
Leave this to me.
Is that it?
It ends here.
